cn.title: 比特派将支持Ethereum Classic（ETC）硬分叉升级

message.data: 比特派将支持Ethereum Classic（ETC）硬分叉升级，根据ETC (Ethereum Classic) 官方计划，ETC将于区块高度达到8,772,000时（预计于香港时间2019年9月12日-13日）进行硬分叉升级。
为保障您的资产安全， 比特派将于2019年9月12日 21:00在APP内暂停ETC相关收发业务，期间请您避免进行ETC的收发行为。
ETC网络稳定后，相关功能会第一时间恢复。

en.title: Announcement on Bitcoin Support ETC Hard Fork Upgrade

message.data: Bitpie wallet will support the Ethereum Classic (ETC) hard fork upgrade. According to the ETC (Ethereum Classic) Official`s  plan, ETC will implement the hard fork at block height 8,772,000 (expected in HK time September 12-13, 2019) for upgrade.
In order to protect the security of your assets, Bitpie will limit the ETC send and receive function in the APP at 21:00 on 12/09/2019. Please avoid ETC sending and receiving during this period.
The related functions will be restored in the first time after the ETC blockchain is stable .
